actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ape attacks twice with its fists.

actions.name: Fists
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10+5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 50/100 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (6d6+5) bludgeoning damage.
